children.value: Bounties come in many shapes and sizes but there are a few ways to make sure things run smoothly. Hereâ€™s the recommended workflow for new contributors.

<CTA>
<Icon size={"40px"} name="liquidation" />  Make sure to express interest in the chat before working on a bounty.{" "} <Link to="https://chat.makerdao.com/channel/community-development"> Community Development </Link>
</CTA>
Most medium to large bounties require collaboration with the Contributing Team. Contributors working on bounties are assigned an Adviser, and in some cases, introduced to other contributors.
Work together to develop a plan that helps structure the approach:
The best way to split up any work
Need help getting started? Utilize a project plan template.
For writing or creating content, review the following resources to ensure the content meets standards.

<Link to="/contribute/content/writing-style-guide/">Writing style guide </Link>
<Link to="/contribute/content/reviewer-guide/">Reviewer guide </Link>
<Link to="/contribute/content/">Visual style guide </Link>
</List>
For developing with Maker, review this curated list of documentation, guides, tools, and APIs.
For developing on this Portal, review this documentation, guides.

Start work in a Google Doc so the Contributing Team can collaboratively review and leave feedback. Be sure to communicate regularly with the team and the wider community. It's strongly encouraged to share work, ask for feedback and keep everyone updated in the
Keep the GitHub issue attached to your bounty up to date with comments and feedback.

<CTA icon="search">
  If the work is content-based, it will have to be copied from a Google Doc to markdown. All content on the site is in markdown. Use Hack.md to create markdown content.
</CTA>
When your work is ready for final approval, submit a pull request in GitHub and update the GitHub issue.
Once a pull request has been approved, the Adviser will let give directions for requesting Dai.
Once a bounty has been completed, let us know what went well and what didnâ€™t. Suggest any ideas for improvements. This can be done on a call or via
Ready to get to work? Check out which bounties currently need help.
Learn how to suggest content changes to this page.
